summary: This mod converts Iron arrows to Iron Bolts that fit into a crossbow However if you download this mod iron arrows will no longer exist you will need the dawnguard mod. Vote and Endorse if you want to see more conversion mods like this Thanks :)
descriptionHtml: This mod converts Iron arrows to Iron Bolts that fit into a crossbow However if you download this mod iron arrows will no longer exist you will need the dawnguard mod. Vote and Endorse if you want to see more conversion mods like this Thanks :)
